<S%H3588>'If<s%> you <S%H4376>make<s%> a <S%H4465>sale,<s%> moreover, to your <S%H5997>friend,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H7069>buy<s%> from your friend's <S%H3027>hand,<s%> you shall not <S%H3238>wrong<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H251>another.<s%>

then I will so <S%H6680>order<s%> My <S%H1293>blessing<s%> for you in the <S%H8345>sixth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> that it will <S%H6213>bring<s%> <S%H6213>forth<s%> the <S%H8393>crop<s%> for <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>
